description: Waste no time with this quick and easy breakfast recipe. With a generous dose of mushrooms and ricotta cheese, it's a delicious take on humble toast.
keywords: Toast,Pescatarian,Sep 2020,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Speedy Mushrooms On Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked (finely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat until melted and foaming. Add mushroom. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until golden.
Add garlic, parsley, zest and lemon juice and cook, stirring, for a further 1 minute or until combined. Spread toast with ricotta, then top with mushroom mixture. Season and serve.
